docstr: `GERROR` — Get last system error message ### Description Returns the system error message corresponding to the last system error. This resembles the functionality of `strerror(3)` in C. ### Syntax `CALL GERROR(RESULT)` ### Arguments and of default ### Example ``` PROGRAM test_gerror   CHARACTER(len=100) :: msg   CALL gerror(msg)   WRITE(*,*) msg END PROGRAM ``` ### Standard GNU extension ### Class Subroutine ### See also IERRNO, PERROR
